sentences.en: Astronomical research began to spread over the whole range of electromagnetic waves.
sentences.cn: 天文研究开始向整个电磁波谱范围延拓.

sentences.en: Astronomical sums of money will be needed for this project.
sentences.cn: 这项工程需要异常庞大数额的资金.

sentences.en: Commencing in 1474, mathematical, astronomical and astrological works appeared in printed form.
sentences.cn: 从1474年起, 数学 、 天文学和占星术的著作开始印刷出版了.

sentences.en: He is engaged in astronomical research.
sentences.cn: 他致力于天文学的研究。

sentences.en: He was an expert on ancient Chinese astronomical literature.
sentences.cn: 他是研究中国古代天文学文献的专家.

sentences.en: Houses in the subdivision are going for astronomical prices.
sentences.cn: 该小区里的房子在以天价出售。

sentences.en: Houses in the village are selling for astronomical prices.
In astronomical situations, the natural line width is seldom directly observed.
sentences.cn: 在天文学研究中, 谱线固有宽度很少能直接观测到.

sentences.en: It leads to the dramatic advances in astronomical photography.
sentences.cn: 天文照相术得到巨大发展.

sentences.en: Our astronomical work is handicapped just now.
sentences.cn: 目前我们的天文工作受到阻碍.

sentences.en: the astronomical costs of land for building
sentences.cn: 建筑用地极其巨大的成本

sentences.en: The four new stamps mark the 100th anniversary of the British Astronomical Association.
sentences.cn: 这四枚新邮票是为了纪念英国天文协会成立100周年而发行的。

sentences.en: The various theories can be grouped into astronomical and terrestrial hypotheses.
sentences.cn: 各种理论可以分成天体说和地球说两大类.

sentences.en: There are differences between historical and astronomical numbering of years.
sentences.cn: 在历史的年代数目和天文年代数目之间存在差别.

sentences.en: These mixtures of astronomical instruments and time - measuring devices cannot be seen as independent time measurers.
sentences.cn: 这类计时器尚不能算是独立的计时器,还是天文仪器与计时仪器的混合体.
